featured.title: Learning Management System
featured.summary: Comprehensive LMS platform with video streaming, progress tracking, and AI-powered personalized learning paths.
featured.problem: Educational institutions needed a scalable platform for online learning with personalized student experiences.
featured.solution: Built a full-featured LMS with video streaming, progress analytics, and AI-driven personalized learning recommendations.
tech_details: Implemented video streaming with AWS CloudFront CDN
Built progress tracking and analytics dashboard
Created AI-powered learning path recommendations

featured.title: AI Helpdesk SaaS
featured.summary: AI-powered helpdesk system with ticket management, role-based dashboards, and generative AI support.
featured.role: Software Engineer â€¢ MERN & Generative AI
featured.impact: Reduced support workload by 50% through automated AI responses and efficient ticket routing.
featured.problem: Support teams struggled with high ticket volume, delayed responses, and lack of contextual knowledge in existing helpdesk systems.
featured.solution: Built a generative AI helpdesk with RAG-powered search, role-based dashboards, and multi-channel automation to streamline ticket resolution.
tech_details: Implemented Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) using LangChain + ChromaDB
Connected OpenAI LLMs for natural language ticket answers and ranking
Developed role-based dashboards for Admin, Support, and Employees
Integrated WhatsApp & Email automation for real-time notifications
Built full MERN stack backend + frontend with TailwindCSS UI
metrics: Adopted by multiple internal teams for workflow automation

featured.title: Task Delegation System
featured.summary: AI-powered task management platform that automatically assigns tasks based on team member skills and availability.
featured.impact: Reduced task assignment time by 70% and improved team productivity by 35%
featured.problem: Manual task assignment was time-consuming and often resulted in mismatched assignments based on team member availability and skills.
featured.solution: Built an AI-powered system that analyzes task requirements, team member skills, and current workload to automatically suggest optimal task assignments.
tech_details: Implemented real-time collaboration using Socket.io
Integrated OpenAI API for intelligent task categorization
Built responsive dashboard with React and Tailwind CSS
Created REST APIs with Express.js and MongoDB

featured.title: CBXMeet - Meeting Scheduler
featured.summary: Effortless scheduling and collaboration tool with advanced features like group scheduling, Meet/Zoom, and seamless calendar integrations.
featured.impact: Simplified scheduling and collaboration for 2000+ professionals across multiple teams.
featured.problem: Teams struggled with managing meetings across multiple platforms, overlapping schedules, and lack of automated reminders.
featured.solution: Developed a modern meeting scheduler with effortless booking, cross-platform integrations, and smart notifications to streamline collaboration.
tech_details: Implemented individual and group scheduling with participant limits
Built scheduled meetings with future booking support
Integrated Google Meet and Zoom with easy switching
Enabled email notifications for reminders and updates
Synced events seamlessly with Google Calendar for both creator and attendees
Prevented overlapping meetings with max-limit constraints
Optimized UI/UX for smooth scheduling experience
metrics: 70% faster scheduling compared to manual coordination
Eliminated meeting conflicts with max-limit enforcement
95% user satisfaction with integrations and ease of use

featured.title: E-Commerce WebApp (Multi-Seller Marketplace)
featured.summary: High-performance multi-seller marketplace with real-time order tracking and analytics dashboards.
featured.impact: Enabled sellers to manage stores efficiently with real-time insights.
featured.problem: Small businesses needed a unified platform to sell products online with multi-seller support and live updates.
featured.solution: Developed a scalable MERN-based marketplace with seller dashboards, analytics, and real-time order notifications.
tech_details: Designed seller dashboards with analytics and inventory management
Implemented WebSocket-based real-time order updates
Created secure authentication and authorization flows
Developed responsive UI with React + TailwindCSS
